fullText: Sharon D. Clarke gives a towering, deeply felt performance as Caroline, a Black maid working for a Jewish family in 1963 Louisiana.
dtliExcerpt: Sharon D. Clarke gives a towering, deeply felt performance as Caroline, a Black maid working for a Jewish family in 1963 Louisiana.
